resources.string: Let\'s join us and \nBuild your relationship with others

Mobile app development is the act or process by which a mobile app is developed for mobile devices, such as personal digital assistants, enterprise digital assistants or mobile phones. These applications can be pre-installed on phones during manufacturing platforms, or delivered as web applications using server-side or client-side processing to provide an "application-like" experience within a Web browser.
To design an application that helps the user to find the best suitable hospital for medication.

Usually many lives are lost due to the time taken for shifting a patient from one hospital to another hospital because of lack of necessary equipment. The existing systems do not provide any information about the availability of equipment of all the hospitals present. There are individual systems of hospitals that show the information about their specific hospital.

Present health care system doesnâ€™t not consist of any medium to know all the information of different hospitals. We have conducted a survey and found that it is required by the people to know information about different hospitals and the equipment present in them so that they can choose appropriate hospital for treatments. It also helps in getting information of medicines and steps to follow in emergency situations.
Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) is one of the oldest state-owned insurance Companies in India.
